title: Spider-Man: Brand New Day
text:

| Plot = | Cast = * {{WP|Tom Holland}} as [[Peter Parker (Earth-199999)|Spider-Man / Peter Parker]] * {{WP|Zendaya}} as [[Michelle Jones (Earth-199999)|Michelle Jones]] Additionally, {{WP|Sadie Sink}} and {{WP|Liza Colón-Zayas}} were cast in undisclosed roles. | Notes = | Trivia = * On November 29, 2021, it was announced that a fourth Spider-Man film was in development, with Tom Holland and Zendaya returning.{{cite web|url=https://www.fandango.com/movie-news/spider-man-no-way-home-producer-amy-pascal-reveals-more-about-the-historic-film-and-confirms-tom-hollands-future-as-spider-man-754461|title='Spider-Man: No Way Home' Producer Amy Pascal Reveals More About the Historic Film and Confirms Tom Holland's Future as Spider-Man|work=Fandango|last=Davis|first=Erik|date=November 29, 2021|accessdate=September 10, 2024}} * The title is likely inspired by the [[Brand New Day]] era from the comics. This is fitting, as it served as a sequel to the events of [[One More Day]], which [[Spider-Man: No Way Home]]—the predecessor to this film—is loosely based on. ==Gallery== ====Logos==== Spider-Man Brand New Day (film) logo 001.jpg Spider-Man Brand New Day (film) logo 002.png | Links = * [[Marvel Films#Upcoming Films|Marvel Films]] }}
